name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

damage.formula: var h = Math.round(a.mhp * 0.25); b.gainHp(h); a.gainHp(-h); h

description:
Heals for 25% of user's max HP, whilst 
damaging them for the same amount. (1-target)
name: Cure 25

description:
Deals damage with illusions of pain. Has a 60% chance
of blinding an enemy for 2 turns.
name: Illusions of Pain

description:
Revives a fallen ally with 50% of their HP, 
and debilitates target ally for 1 turn.
name: Restorative Arts

damage.formula: var h = Math.round(a.mhp * 0.5); var i = Math.round(a.mhp * 0.4); b.gainHp(h); a.gainHp(-i); i; h;

description:
Heals for 50% of user's max HP, whilst damaging 
them for 40% max HP. (1-ally)
name: Heal 50

description:
Lets your ally see the future for a few moments.
Ensures the next attack is a critical hit.
name: Divination

damage.formula: var i = Math.round(a.mhp * 0.25); var h = Math.round(a.mhp * 0.1); b.gainHp(i); a.gainHp(-h); h; i;

description:
Heals for 25% of user's max HP, whilst damaging 
them for 10% max HP per ally healed.
name: Vitality Burst

description:
Deals damage with a 40% chance to poison. Also
imbues your next attack with a deadly venom.
name: Venomed Strike

description: Greatly boosts all allies' agility for 2 turns.
name: Quickstep

description:
Strikes an enemy's vital area and greatly reduces 
their attack and magic for 2 turns.ㅤ
name: Debilitating Strike

description:
Attack three random enemies with a poisonous blade.  
Has a 30% chance to poison with each attack.
name: Poisoned Quickstrike

description:
Perform a first aid on an ally. Heals for 20% of
max HP for 3 turns and cures ailments and stat downs.
name: First Aid

description:
Perform a calculated strike that greatly 
decreases enemy's DEF and MDEF for 2 turns.
name: Armor Crush

description:
Deals wind damage to all enemies. Has a 20% chance to
inflict venom to all enemies.
name: Tempest

description:
Conceals an ally in powerful gusts 
of wind. Nullifies all damage for 1 turn.ㅤ
name: Favor of the Wind

description:
Deals damage with concentrated runes 
with a 35% chance to silence foes.
name: Rune Shot

damage.formula: var r = 1; for(let i=0 ; i<25 ; i++) {if(b.isStateAffected(i)){r+=2}}(a.mat * 5) * r;

description:
Unleashes dormant demonic energy. Status 
effects amplify its damage.
name: Eye of the Sealer

description:
Seals an ally's skills for 1 turn 
and allows them to act twice.
name: Attack Decree

description:
Radiates an incredible aura that brings out potential.
Increases all allies' offensive stats for 3 turns.
name: Air of Superiority

description:
Summons a void that consumes stat 
reduction. Slightly damages the party.
name: Ailment Eater

description:
Lets out the full power of the sealer's eye. 
Severely debilitates all enemy for 1 turn.
name: Premonition of Demise

description:
Deals 150% calculated damage with a 20% 
chance to stun an enemy for 1 turn.
name: Rough Hit

description:
Perform a magic-based attack with your 
weapon, with a 50% chance to silence.
name: Runic Slash

description:
Draws all enemies' attention, and makes you take an 
enemy attack in place of an ally with low HP.
name: Chivalry

description:
Lets out a protective aura that increases
all ally's DEF and MDEF for 2 turns.
name: Great Wall

description:
Prepares your mind and body for battle. 
Increases critical rate by 20% for 3 turns.
name: En Garde!

description:
Hits an enemy with your gauntlet.
Strips all stat increase.
name: Bracer Strike

description:
Cripples one enemy and readies 
yourself for the ultimate attack.
name: Penultimate Move

description:
Gathers an immense amount of life force to overwhelm
the enemy. Heals the party for 50% of their max HP.
name: Gilded Supernova

description:
Summons a demon overlord's powers. Deals 10x of user
magic attack, stuns them, then K.Os the user.
name: Twilight Invocation

description:
Does a series of lunar-infused slashes, then cures
the party of all debuffs and stat downs.
name: Grand Lunar Reap

description:
Recieve blessings from the skies and heaven that
boosts the party's agility, and lets them act twice.
name: Celestial Pathway

description:
Calls an image of a starry lake that absorbs damage.
Cuts incoming damage by half for 3 turns.
name: Astral Lake

description:
Fucks opponents (not literally) 
to oblivion (not the video game)
name: Sudden Death

damage.formula: var h = Math.round(b.mhp * 0.2); a.gainHp(h); b.gainHp(-h); h

message1: is charging up for a powerful ability!
name: Ability Charge

description:
Does a series of lunar-infused slashes, then cures
the party of all debuffs and stat downs.
name: Grand Lunar Reap

description:
Elemental slash laced with hatred. Deals extra damage 
to enemies with defense buffs.
name: Baleful Slash

description: A standard fire-based spellblade attack.
name: Blazecut

description: A standard ice-based spellblade attack.
name: Frostcut

description: A standrard thunder-based spellblade attack.
name: Flashcut

description: Greatly reduces incoming physical and magical damage.
name: Mana Barrier

damage.formula: var h = a.mmp * 0.5; var i = Math.round(a.mhp * 0.1); a.gainMp(h); a.gainHp(-i); i; h;

description:
Drains mana and remove buffs from an enemy whilst
damaging 10% of your max HP.
name: Extract

description:
Lets your ally see the future for a few moments.
Ensures the next attack is a critical hit.
name: Divination

description:
Attack three random enemies with a poisonous blade.  
Has a 30% chance to poison with each attack.
name: Poisoned Quickstrike

description:
Lets out the full power of the sealer's eye. 
Severely debilitates all enemy for 1 turn.
name: Premonition of Demise

description:
Cripples one enemy and readies 
yourself for the ultimate attack.
name: Penultimate Move

description:
Deals 2x calculated damage towards all enemies and
draws all enemy's attention for 3 turns.
name: Aggravate

description:
Attack an enemy with a poisonous blade.  
Has a 30% chance to poison.
name: Poisoned Slash

description:
Increases attack times by 1 and and cuts incoming
damage by 25% for 1 attack. Lasts 3 turns.
name: Illusory Edge

description:
Does a strike that ignores defense and reduces
enemy defense and attack for 1 turn.
name: Obliterating Strike

description:
Summons a storm of high pressure wind currents,
may cause Bleed.
name: Maelstrom

description:
Ensures all allies act first. Effect lasts 
until the unit suffers from damage.
name: Preemptive Strike

description:
An assortment of Michelle's brews and concoctions.
Grants all allies a random buff, healing, or failure.
name: Sketchy Brew

description:
A burst of Oracle healing with no damage penalty,
heals all allies for a random amount.
name: Erratic Healing

description:
Heightens an ally's senses and dexerity. Grants 10%
evasion and counterattacks (50% chance).
name: Precognition

description:
Fully restores party's HP and cleanses all status
effects. Stuns the user for 2 turns.
name: Supreme Restoration

description: Increases all ally's defense by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Guardian's Aura

description:
Deals 2x calculated damage towards all enemies and
draws all enemy's attention for 3 turns.
name: Aggravate

description: Increases all ally's magic defense by 25% for 3 turns.
name: Paragon's Aura

description:
Become immune to all attacks for 1 turn, then reduces
defense by half for the next turn.
name: Indomitable

description:
Use lightning-fast reflexes to shoot an enemy.
Deals magic damage two times.
name: Double Shot

description:
Attack an enemy with an incapacitating shot. Greatly
reduces agility and attack speed.
name: Impairing Shot

description:
A highly precise but weak shot that cancels ability
charge, and has a low chance to stun.
name: Cancelling Shot

description:
Orders all allies except self to attack random
enemies. Does not consume their turn.
name: Resounding Order

description:
Stuns every other foes and allies for a turn and
unleash a barrage of bullets on the enemy.
name: Showstopper
